title: Topic 003 Question 083
body: You have an Azure Storage account named storage1 that contains two containers named container1 and container2. Blob versioning is enabled for both containers.
You periodically take blob snapshots of critical blobs.
You create the following lifecycle management policy.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
